name: Fair Duck Shooting
description:
A virtual reality game about shooting at a fair duck stand.

There is a limited game time, closing a blind that prevents you can shoot the ducks if the time is finished.

You can start a new round and end it whenever you want by shooting the corresponding wooden sign.

To shoot before you must put a bullet in the toy gun.

There are different objectives to shoot:

Ducks of the first lane +1 point.
Ducks of the second lane +3 points.
Eagle of the third lane +15 points.
